CallDisposition.title: CallDisposition
CallDisposition.description: Represents the outcome of a single call.

agent_id.description: The ID of the agent who handled the call.

lead_id.description: The ID of the lead that was called.

disposition_type.description: The selected outcome category for the call.

disposition_notes.description: Optional notes from the agent about the call.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the disposition was logged.

campaign_id.description: The ID of the campaign this call was part of.

outcome_score.description: A numeric score representing the call outcome for analytics.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to ensure authorization independence, clarity, and scalability for the CollectPro application's features. User profiles and notification preferences are stored under the `/users/{userId}` path, providing path-based ownership. System-wide configurations are in a separate `/system_configurations` collection, accessible only to admins. Roles are managed via document existence in `/roles_admin/{userId}`. A new `call_dispositions` collection is added to log call outcomes; security rules will enforce that agents can only create dispositions for their own calls.
